nodes.text: Enja Ode was a Human woman, who worked as a pilot during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.
Ode was vivacious and a skilled pilot. She did not like to risk her life on a regular basis.

In the role-playing game adventure At Your Service, if none of the player characters have the skills to be a pilot, then Ode is hired by the Almas Academy to fly the YT-1300 light freighter Seeker for them.
